inlineContent.text: Learn how to manage your data collection practices for tracking.
When collecting data for the App Tracking Transparency framework, ensure that you have prepared your application according to

tasks.title: Prepare your app for App Tracking Transparency

inlineContent.text: file. If you don’t already have one, create one in Xcode by following the instructions
, add your Braze API endpoint, prefixed by
For instance, if your Braze endpoint is
to the array of privacy tracking domains.
Declare specific pieces of user data to be collected for tracking.

When you configure a data type for tracking, Braze will route all data for that type to the tracking domains declared in the privacy manifest. All non-tracking data will be routed to the regular Braze endpoints.
with the types of data you wish to collect for user tracking.
For the full list of tracking properties available, refer to
For custom events and custom user attributes, you may also indicate specific event or attribute names. Braze will only route those specific events and attributes to the privacy tracking domains.
If you intend to collect all user data for tracking, you may use the
Note that if your user denies App Tracking Transparency permissions, no data will be collected, and Braze will not work as expected.
Notify Braze when users either accept or deny AppTrackingTransparency permissions.
If a user has declined permissions and Braze does not receive the latest authorization status, any data routed for tracking will cause an

tasks.title: Respond to App Tracking Transparency permissions

inlineContent.text: method, request your user’s authorization status from
Ensure that this method is called whenever the application has become active in case the status has changed.
to let Braze know the latest status.
If you wish to modify your initial list at runtime, you may call
to add or remove tracking properties.

tasks.title: Updating your tracking configurations at runtime

inlineContent.text: For example, if you want to update your tracking list only after App Tracking Transparency permissions have been requested, you can call this method in the completion handler.
at any time, wherever appropriate for your use case.
